meanings.definition: Not relating to or characteristic of a hospital.
meanings.sent1: The nonhospital staff provided care at the clinic.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the nonhospital environment of the health center.
meanings.sent3: The nonhospital waiting room had cozy chairs and magazines.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a warm, nonhospital blanket on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The nonhospital setting felt welcoming and familiar.

meanings.sent1: The nonhospital building housed various medical offices.
meanings.sent2: He visited the nonhospital pharmacy to pick up his prescription.
meanings.sent3: The nonhospital cafeteria served delicious meals to patients.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the nonhospital corridors.
meanings.sent5: The nonhospital grounds were beautifully landscaped.

meanings.sent1: The nonhospital treatments helped manage his condition.
meanings.sent2: She received nonhospital care for her minor injury.
meanings.sent3: The nonhospital therapies focused on prevention and wellness.
meanings.sent4: His recovery was swift with nonhospital interventions.
meanings.sent5: The nonhospital approach emphasized holistic health.
